name: Chaos Incorporated
description:
As an employee at Chaos Incorporated, your job is to cause chaos to humans on the surface.

This game is my first game jam and first time creating a game, the game currently does not have audio :(

This game was made for the Brackeys 2021.2 Game Jam

This is my first time creating and uploading a game.

All of the assets used in the game were made by me.
